issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: CBO
components.description: All issues dealing with Hive's cost based optimizer and its interaction with Optiq

fields.summary: Interaction between constraints and MV rewriting may create loop in Calcite planner

ATTACHMENT ID: 12946158 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

[~kgyrtkirk], [~ashutoshc], could you take a look? https://reviews.apache.org/r/69244/
It seems we may miss some opportunities to push down expressions when there are Project operators already in the Join inputs, however this fixes the issue with the loop in the planner. Probably we can tackle the extension in a follow-up.
